item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, January 14, 2025 at 4:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Snyk security researcher deploys malicious NPM packages targeting Cursor.com (111 points | 53 comments)
2. GitHub Git Operations Are Down (273 points | 183 comments)
3. Webtop – Alpine,Ubuntu,Fedora,and Arch containers containing full desktop envs (96 points | 12 comments)
4. I created an open-source Hardware Hacking Wiki – with tutorials for beginners (394 points | 60 comments)
5. voyage-code-3 (34 points | 12 comments)
6. Debugging: Indispensable rules for finding even the most elusive problems (2004) (435 points | 189 comments)
7. Why do small children in Japan ride the subway alone? (12 points | 2 comments)
8. Fluid Simulation Pendant (235 points | 30 comments)

12. A laptop stand made from a single sheet of recycled paper (240 points | 196 comments)
13. When a winter storm trapped a luxury passenger train near Donner Pass (101 points | 64 comments)
14. Sonos CEO steps down after app update debacle (287 points | 285 comments)
15. 'Absolutely insane'. Dragonfly's extreme loop-the-loops unparalleled in nature (6 points | discuss)

19. AI Engineer Reading List (282 points | 40 comments)

21. 43K fewer drivers on Manhattan roads after congestion pricing turned on (117 points | 129 comments)
22. Railroad Tycoon II (235 points | 125 comments)
23. How corn syrup took over America (96 points | 123 comments)
24. How did they make cars fall apart in old movies (2017) (267 points | 97 comments)
25. Scientists Discover Underground Water Vault in Oregon 3x the Size of Lake Mead (54 points | 12 comments)
26. Right to root access (442 points | 370 comments)
27. Humanize Healthcare Content as Wyndly (YC W21) 's first content hire ( | hide)
28. Entropy of a Large Language Model output (137 points | 55 comments)
29. The Origins of Wokeness (613 points | 1532 comments)
30. The Curious Gems of the River Thames (50 points | 20 comments)
